trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> to a string.
It also converts a string to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter> class is used to convert data to and from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> and string types.
You should never access a type converter directly.
Instead, call the appropriate converter by using <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor?displayProperty=fullName>.
For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter?displayProperty=fullName> base class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter"></xref> class.
You should never access a type converter directly.
Instead, call the appropriate converter by using a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> object.
For more information, see the examples in <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>.
Determines whether a data type can be converted to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> method to determine whether the data type specified by the `sourceType` parameter can be converted to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>.
This method will return true only if the `sourceType` is <xref:System.String>.
The only type this converter can convert into <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> is <xref:System.String>.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> implemented object that provides information about the context of a type converter.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that represents the data type to check.
`true` if the data type specified by the sourceType parameter can be converted to a ; otherwise, `false`.
Returns a value indicating whether the converter can convert a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> object to the specified type.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that indicates the context of the object to convert.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that represents the data type to convert to.
`true` if the converter supports converting a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> object to the destination type; otherwise, `false`.
This method will return true only if the destinationType is .
The only type this converter can convert <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> into is <xref href="System.String"></xref>.
Converts an object to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> in a specific culture.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method to convert the object specified by the `value` parameter to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> in the culture specified by the `culture` parameter.
If the specified object is `null`, the returned value is also `null`.
Similarly, if the specified object is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Empty> is returned.
This method can only convert a string to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> implemented object that provides information about the context of a type converter.
A <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> that specifies the culture to represent the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>, when it is expressed in points.
The object to convert to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that represents the converted value.
Converts a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> to an object with a different data type.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter.ConvertTo%2A> method to convert the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> specified by the `value` parameter to an object with the data type specified by the `destinationType` parameter.
<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> is returned from this method if the `value` parameter contains `null`.

<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> is also returned if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> specified by the `value` parameter contains the value `FontSize.NotSet`.
This method can only convert a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> to a string.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> implemented object that provides information about the context of a type converter.
A <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> that specifies the culture to represent the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>, when it is expressed in points.
A <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> to convert.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that represents the data type to convert to.
A <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that represents the converted value.

Returns a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection"></xref> containing the standard values for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>, using the specified format context.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method to retrieve a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection?displayProperty=fullName> containing the standard values for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>.
This collection contains all the fields in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> class.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides information about the context of a type converter.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection"></xref> containing the standard values for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>.

Returns whether the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection"></xref> returned by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter.GetStandardValues(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext)"></xref> method is an exclusive list of values, using the specified format context.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A> method to determine whether the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection?displayProperty=fullName> returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method is an exclusive list of values.
This method is overridden to always return `false` to indicate that the list of values is not an exclusive list.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides information about the context of a type converter.
`false` for all cases.

Returns whether the instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter"></xref> class that this method is called from supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list, using the specified format context.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A> method to determine whether the instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter> class that this method is called from supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list, using the specified format context.
This method is overridden to always return `true` to indicate that this class supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides information about the context of a type converter.
`true` for all cases.
